text: Felipe González Márquez (born 5 March 1942) is a Spanish socialist politician. He was the General Secretary of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE) from 1974 to 1997. To date, he remains the longest-serving Prime Minister of Spain, after having served four successive mandates from 1982 to 1996. He is married and has three children. Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seville Category:Prime Ministers of Spain Category:Social democrats
title: Felipe González
